headline: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated Declares Cash Dividend On Its Series I Preferred Stock
summary: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated announced that the Board of Directors declared and set aside a quarterly cash dividend on the company's 5.70% Series I Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock (Nasdaq: HBANM) of $356.25 per share (equivalent to $0.35625 per depositary share) payable June 2, 2025, to shareholders of record on May 15, 2025.
